people. Remember when Sen. Bernie Sanders Boehner promised a 100 Billion in spending cuts just in the first year if they won in Nov. 2010. Here is the actual quote from their`` Pledge to America''. With common-sense exceptions for seniors, veterans, and our troops, we will roll back government spending to prestimulus, pre-bailout levels, saving us at least$ 100 billion in the first year alone and putting us on a path to begin paying down the debt, balancing the budget, and ending the spending spree in Washington that threatens our children's future . DC- In a surprise shakeup, Google co-founder Larry Page is replacing Eric Schmidt as chief executive of the search giant. Starting April 4, Page will take over day-to-day operations while Eric Schmidt becomes executive chairman, focusing on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership. Shortly after the announcement was posted on the company's blog, Eric Schmidt tweeted`` Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed!'' in reference to his much-discussed role as a moderating check to Page

Mr Andy Coulson said: It came to Bob Bird first. He alerted me to its existence and I travelled to Glasgow. I viewed the tape and I suggested to Bob he should do all he could to verify the tape, though I believed it to be authentic on my first viewing and the tape was published. The journalist said he decided to resign from his post after more than three years because of mounting coverage over his old job.
